pages.title: Fluid Check Valve
pages.text: This check valve contains a prestressed spring plate that can be pushed from the back, but not from the front face. Therefore it allows liquids to pass through only in one direction.$(br)Its main purpose is to prevent backflows in fluid pipe systems.

The valve can be inserted between $(o)Fluid Pipes$(), as well as directly to fluid inputs or outputs of devices. The yellow arrow marks the flow direction.$(br2)To place the valve, click on the face it shall be directed to. Sneak-click if you need the opposite flow direction (e.g. when clicking at a fluid output face). Maximum flow rate is $(o)$(t:The value is configurable and may vary)1000mB per tick$().
